description.en: Find all unique triplets that sum to zero
description.zh-CN: Find all unique triplets that sum to zero
description.zh-TW: Find all unique triplets that sum to zero
description.ja: Find all unique triplets that sum to zero
description.es: Find all unique triplets that sum to zero
description.de: Find all unique triplets that sum to zero
description.fr: Find all unique triplets that sum to zero

explanation.en: Creates triple outer product (⍵∘.+⍵∘.+⍵) of all three-number sums. Finds positions where sum equals 0 (⍸0=+⌿), extracts unique triplets (∪↓).
explanation.zh-CN: 创建所有三数之和的三重外积 (⍵∘.+⍵∘.+⍵)。找到和为 0 的位置 (⍸0=+⌿)，提取唯一三元组 (∪↓)。
explanation.zh-TW: 創建所有三數之和的三重外積 (⍵∘.+⍵∘.+⍵)。找到和為 0 的位置 (⍸0=+⌿)，提取唯一三元組 (∪↓)。
